title: What precautions should be taken when interacting with sleepwalkers in a magnetic state?
first_phrase: In this section, "Des Relations entre le Magnétiseur et les Somnambules," the author provides guidance on how to maintain effective and healthy relationships between the magnetizer and the sleepwalkers. The last 200 tokens address various queries related to the behavior and communication with the sleepwalkers during and outside the magnetic sleep state. The author advises against precipitating the wakefulness of the sleepwalkers and suggests keeping the individuals involved in the process restrained from encouraging too much spiritual elevation in the sleepwalkers. Additionally, the author provides insight into what behaviors could be potentially harmful to the sleepwalkers' health and well-being.
content: Tant qu'il dort, qu'il ne parle pas ou qu'il né fait pas d'efforts pour parler, on doit éviter de lui adresser la parole et de le questionner, pour ne pas le déranger dans le développement de ses idées, par une trop grande et trop impatiente curiosité; quand il parle, on ne doit montrer aucune incrédulité, au con- traire.
